name: Coconut Quest
description:
Coconut Quest is a short video game where you have to help a monkey get back the coconuts stolen by the coconut crabs.

This game has been made using Bitsy (you can find the tool here). In fact, it is the first game I have made with it.

P.S.: I know real coconut trees don't have branches... but are they even trees? If they can be called trees, then allow me that licence.
